text: I've seen the summers, the fall and winters
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 我见过夏日、秋日与冬日

text: I've walked a thousand miles just to be here
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 我跋涉千里只为抵达此处

text: And not a day too soon
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Looking back at the life that we had, the things that we've been through.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 回望我们共度的生活，经历过的种种

text: Remember this day, as I go my way, that leads me back to you.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 请铭记今日，当我踏上归途，那条引我回到你身边的路

text: When the lights don't place, the music fades, and I've done all I can do.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 当灯光不再亮起，音乐渐渐消逝，我已竭尽所能

text: Don't be afraid to walk alone Cause I'm on my way to you
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 别害怕独自前行，因为我正朝你走来

text: Soon a new face will take up my place, a circle will renew.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 很快会有新面孔接替我的位置，循环将重新开始

text: Another chapter, forever after, I know I'll see you soon.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 新的篇章，永恒之后，我知道很快会与你重逢

text: When I lost no place, the music fades, and I've done all I can do.
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 当我无处可去，音乐渐渐消逝，我已竭尽所能

text: Don't be afraid to walk alone Cause I'm on my way to you
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 别害怕独自前行，因为我正朝你走来

text: Don't be afraid to walk alone Cause I'm on my way to you
speaker: SPEAKER_01
translation: 别害怕独自前行，因为我正朝你走来
